channel.title: [718] A good progress on Big Chompy Bird Hunting

item.title: [718] A good progress on Big Chompy Bird Hunting
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Rantz.java

[code=java]
package com.feather.game.player.dialogues.ogre.city;

import com.feather.game.player.dialogues.Dialogue;
import com.feather.game.player.dialogues.quests.BigChompyBirdHunting;

/**

  • Created by Arham 4 on 8/9/14.
    */
    public class Rantz extends Dialogue {
    private int npcId;
    @Override
    public void start() {
    npcId = (int) parameters[0];
    if (!player.startedBigChompyBirdHunting) {
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “Hey you creature! Make me some stabbers! I wanna hunt da chompy?”);
    } else if (player.inProgressBigChompyBirdHunting) {
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9827, “Hey you creature… Have you made me da stabbers? I wanna stick da chompy?”);
    stage = 15;
    }
    }

    @Override
    public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
    switch (stage) {
    case -1:
    sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE, “What are ‘stabbers’?”, “What’s a ‘chompy’?”, “Ok, I’ll make you some ‘stabbers’.”, “Er, make your own ‘stabbers’!”);
    stage = 0;
    break;
    case 0:
    switch (componentId) {
    case OPTION_1:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “What are stabbers?”);
    stage = 1;
    break;
    case OPTION_2:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “What’s a ‘chompy’?”);
    stage = 5;
    break;
    case OPTION_3:
    BigChompyBirdHunting.handleProgressQuest(player);
    sendPlayerDialogue(9830, “Ok, I’ll make you some ‘stabbers’.”);
    stage = 14;
    break;
    case OPTION_4:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9830, “Er, make your own ‘stabbers’!”);
    stage = 13;
    break;
    }
    break;
    case 1:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “For da stabbie chucker, I’s wanna hunt da chompy! Creature knows what Rantz wants… …flyin’ to stabbie da chompy!”);
    stage = 2;
    break;
    case 2:
    sendEntityDialogue(IS_ITEM, “”, 2883, 1, “The ogre shows you a huge but crude bow and then starts to nod”, “energetically in an effort to help you understand.”);
    stage = 3;
    break;
    case 3:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “I think I understand. You want me to make some arrows for you?”);
    stage = 4;
    break;
    case 4:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “Yeah, is what Rantz sayed, make da stabbers for da stabby chucker!”);
    stage = 8;
    break;
    case 5:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “Da chompy is der bestest yummies for Rantz, Fycie and Bugs! We’s looking for da yummies all da time. Da chompy is a big flapper, Rantz want’s stabbers to sneaky, sneaky, stick da chompy.”);
    stage = 6;
    break;
    case 6:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “Ah, so ‘da chompy’ is some king of bird?”);
    stage = 7;
    break;
    case 7:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “Yes, is what Rantz sayed, Da chompy is da big flapper and is bestest yummies. But Rantz needs stabbers to stick da chompy… Will creatures make dem stabbers for us?”);
    stage = -1;
    break;
    case 8:
    sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE, “How do I make the ‘stabbers’?”, “What’s a ‘chompy’?”, “Ok, I’ll make you some ‘stabbers.’”, “Er, make your own ‘stabbers’!”);
    stage = 9;
    break;
    case 9:
    switch (componentId) {
    case OPTION_1:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “How do I make the ‘stabbers’?”);
    stage = 10;
    break;
    case OPTION_2:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “What’s a ‘chompy’?”);
    stage = 5;
    break;
    case OPTION_3:
    BigChompyBirdHunting.handleProgressQuest(player);
    sendPlayerDialogue(9830, “Ok, I’ll make you some ‘stabbers’.”);
    stage = 14;
    break;
    case OPTION_4:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9830, “Er, make your own ‘stabbers’!”);
    stage = 13;
    break;
    }
    break;
    case 10:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “Ahh, da creature wants to know Rantz secret for stabbers? Rantz not say till day creature says will make da stabbers for us else you Creature steals da chompy from us!”);
    stage = 11;
    break;
    case 11:
    sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE, “What’s a ‘chompy’?”, “Ok, I’ll make you some ‘stabbers.’”, “Er, make your own ‘stabbers’!”);
    stage = 12;
    break;
    case 12:
    switch (componentId) {
    case OPTION_1:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9827, “What’s a ‘chompy’?”);
    stage = 5;
    break;
    case OPTION_2:
    BigChompyBirdHunting.handleProgressQuest(player);
    sendPlayerDialogue(9830, “Ok, I’ll make you some ‘stabbers’.”);
    stage = 14;
    break;
    case OPTION_3:
    sendPlayerDialogue(9830, “Er, make your own ‘stabbers’!”);
    stage = 13;
    break;
    }
    break;
    case 13:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9789, “What I make ‘stabbers’, I pretend you chompy and practice on you!”);
    stage = -2;
    break;
    case 14:
    sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, “Good you creature, you need sticksies from achey tree and stabbies from dog bones.”);
    stage = -2;
    break;
    case 15:
    if (player.getInventory().containsItem(2866, 6) && player.madeOgreArrows) {

             } else if (player.getInventory().containsItem(2866, 6) && !player.madeOgreArrows) {

         } else {
             sendPlayerDialogue(9830, "Er not exactly?");
             stage = 16;
         }
         break;
     case 16:
         sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9789, "You do stabbers quick!..quick!. Or Rantz make stabbers for Rantz and then practice for chompy sticking on creature!");
         stage = 17;
         break;
     case 17:
         sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE, "How do I make the 'stabbers' again?", "Ok, I'll make the 'stabbers' for you.");
         stage = 18;
         break;
     case 18:
         switch (componentId) {
             case OPTION_1:
                 sendPlayerDialogue(9827, "How do I make the 'stabbers' again?");
                 stage = 19;
                 break;
             case OPTION_2:
                 sendPlayerDialogue(9830, "Ok, I'll make the 'stabbers' for you.");
                 stage = 22;
                 break;
         }
         break;
     case 19:
         sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, "Grr creature...you's no good stabber maker! You's make da stabbie bit from da dog bones, and get da sticksies from da Achey tree...simple see! Oh and da flufsies from da flappers as well!");
         stage = 20;
         break;
     case 20:
         sendPlayerDialogue(9827, "Oh, so I need logs from the achey tree, bones from a canine...and feathers?");
         stage = 21;
         break;
     case 21:
         sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, "Is just what Rantz sayed! <col=1B18F1>~ The hulking ogre nods excitedly.</col>");
         stage = -2;
         break;
     case 22:
         sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9830, "Good creature, quickly, hurry bring da stabbers!");
         stage = -2;
         break;
     default:
         end();
         break;
 }

    }

    @Override
    public void finish() {

    }
    }[/code]
    Player.java

//Big Chompy Bird Hunting public boolean startedBigChompyBirdHunting = false; public boolean inProgressBigChompyBirdHunting = false; public boolean madeOgreArrows = false; public boolean completedBigChompyBirdHunting = false;
Yes, this is horrible. No getters and setters. I said cba to make them because I was having fun writing the dialogue. xD

BigChompyBirdHunting.java

[code=java]
package com.feather.game.player.dialogues.quests;

import com.feather.game.player.Player;
import com.feather.game.player.Skills;

/**

  • Created by Arham 4 on 8/9/14.
    */
    public class BigChompyBirdHunting {

    /**

    • Sends the configuration to the quest tab and sets Doric’s Quest into progress.
    • @param player
      */
      public static void handleProgressQuest(final Player player) {
      player.startedBigChompyBirdHunting = true;
      player.inProgressBigChompyBirdHunting = true;
      player.getPackets().sendConfig(293, 1);
      player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterfaces();
      player.getPackets().sendUnlockIComponentOptionSlots(190, 15, 0, 201, 0, 1, 2, 3);
      }

    /**

    • The interface before the player has started the quest.
    • @param player
      */
      public static void handleQuestStartInterface(final Player player) {
      player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
      player.getPackets().sendRunScript(1207, 3);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, “Big Chompy Bird Hunting”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, “”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, “<col=330099>I can start this quest by speaking to the ogre <col=660000Rantz <col=330099>who”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, “<col=330099>lives <col=660000>East <col=330099>of the <col=660000>Ogre City<col=330099>, <col=660000>North <col=330099>of the <col=660000>Swamp Pool.”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, “<col=330099>To complete this quest I need:”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) > 5 ? “” : “<col=330099>”) + “Level 5 Fletching”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) > 30 ? “” : “<col=330099>”) + “Level 30 Cooking”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RANGE) > 30 ? “” : “<col=330099>”) + “Level 30 Ranging”);
      if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) > 5 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) > 30 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RANGE) > 30) {
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, “<col=330099>I have all the <col=660000>stats <col=330099>needed to complete this quest.”);
      } else {
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, “”);
      }
      for (int i = 18; i < 300; i++) {
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, “”);
      }
      }

    /**

    • The interface during the quest when the player gathers the items.
    • @param player
      */
      public static void handleProgressQuestInterface(final Player player) {
      player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
      player.getPackets().sendRunScript(1207, 3);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, “Big Chompy Bird Hunting”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, “”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, “<col=330099>I can start this quest by speaking to the ogre <col=660000Rantz <col=330099>who”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, “<col=330099>lives <col=660000>East <col=330099>of the <col=660000>Ogre City<col=330099>, <col=660000>North <col=330099>of the <col=660000>Swamp Pool.”);
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, “<col=330099>I agreed to get <col=660000>Rantz <col=330099>some <col=660000>‘stabbers’”);
      for (int i = 14; i < 300; i++) {
      player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, “”);
      }
      }
      }[/code]
      ButtonHandler.java
      Below:

} else if (interfaceId == 190) {
Add:

if (componentId == 15 && slotId == 20) { if (!player.startedBigChompyBirdHunting) { BigChompyBirdHunting.handleQuestStartInterface(player); } if (player.inProgressBigChompyBirdHunting) { BigChompyBirdHunting.handleProgressQuestInterface(player); } }

Reason for incompletion: While I was fetching dialogue, my account got kicked and banned from RS. R.I.P my 9 year old main, Arham 4 AKA District CLI.
